title: 求助 服务器直接被STOP
author: qq2282306201
txt_content:
这是后台记录  请问这是为什么 他能直接STOP
[09:30:27] [Async Chat Thread - #1/INFO]: [m<[0;31;1mQiFengS[m> 等下[m
[09:30:28] [User Authenticator #8/INFO]: UUID of player lowb is e5897a41-0959-3bd6-8697-78fcb1a21365
[09:30:28] [Server thread/INFO]: Detected the PlayerJoinEvent of player lowb
[09:30:28] [Server thread/INFO]: Forced lowb to defined location.
[09:30:28] [Server thread/INFO]: lowb[/125.43.142.162:52396] logged in with entity id 246 at ([world] 642.5623090076797, 72.0, 183.41645879299475)
[09:30:30] [Async Chat Thread - #1/INFO]: [m<[0;31;1mQiFengS[m> 插件[m
[09:30:35] [Server thread/INFO]: lowb issued server command: /l 123456
[09:30:35] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] lowb 已成功登陆!
[09:30:38] [Async Chat Thread - #1/INFO]: [m<lowb[m> 小辣椒看i[m
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: lowb issued server command: /stop 垃圾腐竹滚你大爷
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: lowb: Stopping the server..[m
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: QiFengS lost connection: 垃圾腐竹滚你大爷
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: kule lost connection: 垃圾腐竹滚你大爷
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: kule  进入晓时代子服
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: huh8 lost connection: 垃圾腐竹滚你大爷
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: huh8  进入晓时代子服
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: lowb lost connection: 垃圾腐竹滚你大爷
[09:30:47] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content: 他可能有op权限,你可以尝试 deop kule指令,如果不行,请检查你的权限组配置

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content: 很有可能是被安装后门插件 请贴出插件目录的截图

replies.author: qq2282306201
replies.txt_content: 我换成了1.7.2的bc端就没事了   可是我想支持1.7-1.8 原本就是1.7-.18
